sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM I_EDITOR_RECORD WHERE 1=1 AND CONFIG_SEQ = #configSeq#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM2,B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT CONFIG_SEQ, (SELECT TITLE FROM I_EDITOR_CONFIG WHERE SEQ = X.CONFIG_SEQ ) AS CONFIG_NAME, SEQ, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_NAME, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_FMT FROM I_EDITOR_RECORD X WHERE 1=1 AND CONFIG_SEQ = #configSeq#
SEQ = #seq#
) A ORDER BY REG_DATE_FMT DESC, SEQ DESC ) B ) WHERE 1=1
RNUM2 BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
ORDER BY RNUM2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONFIG_SEQ, (SELECT TITLE FROM I_EDITOR_CONFIG WHERE SEQ = X.CONFIG_SEQ ) AS CONFIG_NAME, SEQ, CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_FMT, REG_ID, REG_NAME FROM( SELECT CONFIG_SEQ, SEQ, CONTENTS, REG_DATE, REG_ID, REG_NAME FROM I_EDITOR_RECORD WHERE 1=1 AND CONFIG_SEQ = #configSeq# ) ) WHERE SEQ= #seq#
